tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sandeep was very attentive and detailed with his explanation and treatment. My entire family
Impacted with covid and he did treat the family with utmost care and kind enough to guide me with proper medication even post hospitalisation. He prefers the right medication as needed and will not prescribe unnecessary diagnosis unless required. I strongly recommend Dr. Sandeep for all my well wishers, Friends and relatives. Thanks to Dr. Sandeep again for his special care for my family. I sincerely appreciate!!!

Regards
Raghavendra Sadhu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited sunshine Gachibowli for my husband sake as he got Covid positive & he was in very serious condition.dr Sandeep reddy treated him & he saved his life for that we will be very greatful to doctor. ** ** **** **** ******* his treatment was marvellous.he has much patience in explaining the risks it is very difficult to find such a noble doctor now  a days sir thanks for caring patient & thanks for nursing care in sunshine

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Just horrible experience. I went with my mother to consult about some lumps she has on both her hands. The doctor sits in Arete Hospital ** **** ***** ***** ******** ** ************** The fees was INR 800 plus INR 200 for first time. After initial consultation he prescribed some tests which was done there and costed about INR 11K. After reports came we did the follow-up consultation and he prescribed some medicines ********** **** ******** *** * **** ***** ****** ****** **** ** ******* *** ** ******. We decided to visit again after couple of weeks they charged another INR 800. During consultation when we told there was no improvement, he finally said there is a specialist in another hospital he knows and asked us to consult that doctor.  Basically, it is a way to compensate cost for the expensive hospital prescribing expensive tests and then just giving pain killers. He could have prescribed other doctor during the first visit but that would not have served the purpose. Anyway, please stay away ** **** ****** ** *** **** *** ******** *** *** ** **** **** ******** **** *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After providing all the necessary report, doctor asked me to go through all the test once again from his laboratory **** *** *** ******** ******** I just wanted him to go through the report & provide me the fitness report on the basis of those ********* reports. But couldn't get it *** ** ******** ******* ****** ** *** ***** *** ** ** ****** ** ******* *** ******** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** **** **** ******* He respects patients. I consulted Sandeep sir quite a few times. He doesn't prescribe heavy medicines. Due to this pandemic I'm una to consult sir he is not available online. I wish sir is providing online consultation. Now he is my most trusted doctor. Thanks a lot sir.

The consultation experience was very good, visited to show for fever he was listening to my problems, I would like to recommend the doctor to family and friends, nothing to make better with the doctor my experience was overall good I''m satisfied with the doctor and his treatment, doctors behaviour with the patient was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sandeep treated my parents for covid. Both are above 75 with usual age related complications. Dr Sandeep is very professional explained clearly the risk factors and the challenges, sets you right expectations ,no false promises and explains very clearly what is happening and what can be the next steps. Coming to waiting time , it's amazing the support staff maintenance his dairy exceptional. Have observed it is true for all the patient s. He listens to patients with attention and diagnoise to the best Awesome Doc !!!

**** ******. He is very simple and gentle in his behavior and great humanitarian. He will give sufficient time to each patient. He studies the patient and disease meticulously. We can freely interact with the doctor.

review: ** ** *** **** ****** * my whole family were treatment by him for CoVId. He has taken care of our family pretty well.
I know the doctor from almost 4 yrs now, I have consulted the doctor multiple times for multiple issues, every time I consult the doctor my health issues were resolved,
